instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
threads.message: Its pretty weird.  will find a spinning hard drive in recovery mode disk utility but will not find any samsung ssd that im trying to install.  changed the hdd cable as well with no change.  ssd is good and works in other computers.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
threads.message: No idea. Firs thing would be to try another brand of SSD.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
threads.message: ive never had any issues with the samsung pro 850/860 ssd tho.  done plenty of upgrades.  ive tried a couple of them all same issue
